results.title: Calcium Channel Blockers and the Risk of Exacerbation in Patients with Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease: A Nationwide Study of 48,488 Outpatients
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ seems to be a safe first choice for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@arterial hypertension@@@ in @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: S-AMLODIPINE AS A MODERN EFFECTIVE ANTIHYPERTENSIVE AND AN ANTIANGINAL AGENT.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Results: This study shows the high clinical effectiveness of the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@S-amlodipine@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@arterial hypertension@@@ associated with @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Chopei IV, Chubirko KI, Bychko MV, Hechko MM, Kedyk AV, Kogutych II. S-AMLODIPINE AS A MODERN EFFECTIVE ANTIHYPERTENSIVE AND AN ANTIANGINAL AGENT. Wiad Lek. 2023;76(11):2429-2434. PMID: 38112360

results.title: [Combination therapy in arterial hypertension: how to personalize treatment].
results.text_hl: Therefore, the combinations of @CHEMICAL_Ramipril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017257 @@@ramipril@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_candesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081643 @@@candesartan@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ represent a therapeutic opportunity of primary importance as they combine the ACE-inhibitor, AT1 antagonist and the calcium channel blocker with the best documentation of efficacy in randomized controlled trials.In conclusion, the support of the scientific literature indicates that the rational use of these combinations can certainly represent an optimal choice for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@arterial hypertension@@@ according to the best criteria of therapeutic appropriateness.

citations.NLM: Bacca A, Taddei S. [Combination therapy in arterial hypertension: how to personalize treatment]. G Ital Cardiol (Rome). 2025 Jan;26(1 Suppl 2):e23-e31. PMID: 39898751
citations.BibTeX: @article{39898751, title={[Combination therapy in arterial hypertension: how to personalize treatment].}, author={Bacca A and Taddei S}, journal={G Ital Cardiol (Rome)}, volume={26}, number={1 Suppl 2}, pages={e23-e31}}

results.title: Opportunities of Amlodipine as a Potential Candidate in the Evaluation of Drug Compliance during Antihypertensive Therapy
results.text_hl: To control @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@arterial hypertension@@@, 70 (86.4%) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ used fixed-dose combinations, where one of the components was @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

results.title: [Vasoprotective effects hypotensive therapy in patients with coronary heart disease combined with chronic kidney disease stage 2-3 after coronary stenting].
results.text_hl: The use of @CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@perindopril@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ following stenting exerted the most significant angioprotective and cardioprotective effect.Conclusion      @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@IHD@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@AH@@@ in combination with early @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@CKD@@@ have pronounced impairment of the condition of arterial blood vessels and the heart.

citations.NLM: Pribylova NN, Yakovleva MV, Pribylov CA, Barbashina TA, Gavriljuk EV, Mal GS, Pribylov VS. [Vasoprotective effects hypotensive therapy in patients with coronary heart disease combined with chronic kidney disease stage 2-3 after coronary stenting]. Kardiologiia. 2021 Aug 31;61(8):14-22. PMID: 34549689

results.title: Use of single pill combinations in the treatment of arterial hypertension in Poland: The current practice and guidelines, the impact on reimbursement spending and patient co-payment
results.text_hl: The potential of switching from @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@AH@@@ treatment in the analyzed period using monocomponent drugs with the equivalent SPC amounted to 19% of unit volume (a reduction of 212M units), with the highest switch potential (43.9%) for drugs containing @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Czech M, Boguslawski S, Smaga A, Filipiak KJ. Use of single pill combinations in the treatment of arterial hypertension in Poland: The current practice and guidelines, the impact on reimbursement spending and patient co-payment Cardiol J. 2022;29(3):405-412. PMID: 35578761
